ygData.subject: Maxima, Alex, Yggdrasil and Empath
ygData.msgSnippet: His tone none too softer, Yggdrasil decided he had to make them wait. Yggdrasil: I m afraid none of you can go in for now, as there is a strategic meeting

His tone none too softer, Yggdrasil decided he had to make them wait.

Yggdrasil: I'm afraid none of you can go in for now, as there is a
strategic meeting taking place. I'll call Empath, though.

He switched to personal comm with Empath.

Yggdrasil: Empath, there seems to be a Decepticon who wants to talk to
you just outside the base.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/27/03 5:51:49 PM Central Standard Time, 
> wingedwarrior41@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Yggdrasil noticed there was a gathering just outside the base. He
> > turned the autoguns to manual mode and aimed then loudly at the three
> > guests.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: To the two Maximals units and the lone Decepticon, you are
> > now on Maximal grounds. State your identity and business here.
> > 
> > He knew it was cold for a welcome to the Maximal and the human, as his
> > internal detector revealed, but he was not happy at all to see the
> > Decepticon spark signature. It was wondrous already that he had not
> > blown the Decepticreep to pieces yet...
> > 
> > 
> 
> 
> > "where here to speak with Prime" Keyra said getting off Rapid who 
> > transformed and removed the hook from his back
> 
> 
> Glancing at the human & the bot, then at the base. "I'm here to see
Empath. I 
> hope she is still here. If not.. I'll wait. I need to rest anyway."
